introduction: I'm a passionate web and mobile developer in my third year at Technological University Hmawbi and an ITPEC FE certificate holder. With 2 years of experience, I've built full-stack apps using React, Laravel, PostgreSQL, and Tailwind CSS. I also work with tools like n8n, Power BI, Figma, and React Native. I enjoy creating clean, functional user experiences and solving real-world problems with code.
